response.overview: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychotic killer.
response.tagline: It started as a joke. Now the joke is on them.
response.title: Joy Ride

cast.name: Mary Wickliffe
cast.character: Salt Lake City Police Desk Clerk

cast.name: McKenzie Satterthwaite
cast.character: Assistant Salt Lake City Police Desk Clerk
